title: Should Baker Mayfield play? Jared Goff returns to LA, Can the Chiefs stop Derrick Henry?
itunes:title: Should Baker Mayfield play? Jared Goff returns to LA, Can the Chiefs stop Derrick Henry?
description:
In the latest edition of the Good Morning Football Podcast, hosts Kay Adams, Kyle Brandt, Peter Schrager, and Cris Carter debate Browns QB Baker Mayfield playing Thursday against the Broncos with an injury and on a short week. Cris Carter explains how he thinks the Chiefs can stop Titans RB Derrick Henry from repeating his MNF performance against the Bills. Kay gives her Which Guy Wednesday fantasy football picks and we explore which NFL player you would trust the most.

The Good Morning Football Podcast is part of the NFL Podcast Network.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
